    • Bullet

      public Bullet(javafx.scene.image.Image image, double x, double y)

      Overrides:

    • setPlayerShot

      public void setPlayerShot()
      Sets the playerShot boolean to true. The player shot the bullet

    • setBossShot

      public void setBossShot()
      Sets the bossShot to true. The boss shot the bullet

    • getPlayerShot

      public boolean getPlayerShot()
      Gets the player shot boolean. Used for moving the bullet accordingly
      Returns:
      boolean

    • getBossShot

      public boolean getBossShot()
      Gets the boss shot boolean. Used to determine if the homingShot method needs to be used.
      Returns:
      boolean

    • move

      public void move()
      Moves the bullet. Up if the player shot, and down if the alien shot it. At a constant rate.

    • moveHoming

      public void moveHoming(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, Player player)
